snippet: Investigators have interviewed over a dozen teachers from two elementary schools on Long Island’s North Shore in an inquiry into possible coaching during state exams.
abstract: Investigators for Glen Cove school district on Long Island's North Shore are looking into allegations that more than a dozen educators from two elementary schools improperly helped students on standardized tests; teachers from the Margaret A Connolly and Landing Elementary Schools could face disciplinary proceedings.
lead_paragraph: Investigators have interviewed over a dozen teachers from two elementary schools on Long Island’s North Shore in an inquiry into possible coaching during state exams.

headline.seo: Long Island Educators Under Inquiry for Test Help
headline.main: Allegations of Test Help by Teachers
headline.print_headline: Allegations Of Test Help By Teachers
